text: Fabriciano Sigampa (15 September 1936 – 31 March 2021) was an Argentine Roman Catholic archbishop. He was born in Vichigasta, Argentina. Sigampa was ordained to the priesthood in 1970. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Reconquista, Argentina from 1985 to 1993 and was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of La Rioja, Argentina from 1993 to 2006. He was archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Resistencia, Argentina, from 2006 to 2013.Fabriciano Sigampa Sigampa died on 31 March 2021 in La Rioja, Argentina at the age of 84.Murió en La Rioja monseñor Fabriciano Sigampa == References == Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Fabriciano Sigampa
